name: RedRoof
0:
”Alexa, Ask Red Roof about reservations?”
”Alexa, Ask Red Roof about their pet policy?”
”Alexa, Ask Red Roof why I should get a RediCard?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: red roof
Developer Terms of Use
des: Traveling with Red Roof? With our Alexa skill, we can answer questions about your stay on any Alexa-enabled device. Want to know our pet policy? Ask Red Roof. Interested in our RediCard rewards program? Ask Red Roof. Getting ready for a family road trip? Turn your drive into a space voyage with our story-driven car games!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
